TORONTO, May 2 News Corp NWSA.O said on Friday it would buy romance novel publisher Harlequin Enterprises Ltd from Canadian newspaper company Torstar Corp TSb.TO for C$455 million ($415 million) in cash in a move to boost its non-English book publishing.UPDATE 4-News Corp ties knot with romance novel publisher TORONTO/NEW YORK, May 2 For Harlequin Enterprises Ltd, the romance novel publisher that News Corp agreed to buy for $415 million, the title of one of its latest offerings, My Fair Billionaire

ON THE MOVE-RBC Wealth Management hires advisers from Wells Fargo May 2 RBC Wealth Management
column3: a unit of RBC Capital Markets LLC
column4: said on Friday that it hired three veteran advisers from Wells Fargo & Co for its Leawood office.

column2: U.S. seeks another extension for Okada payments probe TOKYO
column3: May 2 U.S. prosecutors are seeking to put a civil lawsuit between Wynn Resorts Ltd and Japanese billionaire Kazuo Okada on hold for another six months to continue a criminal investigation into Okada and his companies regarding payments in the Philippines
column4: according to a motion filed to a Nevada court.
